entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 5:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
